question: Which company has been honoured as the World's Most Ethical Company for the year 2018 by Ethisphere Institute recently?
explanation: Tata Steel has been honoured as the World's Most Ethical Company for the year 2018 by Ethisphere Institute. Tata Steel has been conferred with the Most ethical Company award for the sixth time in the 'Metals, Minerals and Mining' category. The World's Most Ethical Company assessment is done with reference to the Ethisphere Institute's Ethics Quotient (EQ) framework. This year about 135 entities from 23 countries are honoured.
